refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: g_base_info_equal ()
refsect2.para:
Compare two #GIBaseInfo.
Using pointer comparison is not practical since many functions return different instances of #GIBaseInfo that refers to the same part of the TypeLib; use this function instead to do #GIBaseInfo comparisons.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_get_attribute ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve an arbitrary attribute associated with this node.

listitem.simpara: a freeform string naming an attribute
The value of the attribute, or %NULL if no such attribute exists

refsect2.title: g_base_info_get_container ()
refsect2.para: Obtain the container of the @info. The container is the parent GIBaseInfo. For instance, the parent of a #GIFunctionInfo is an #GIObjectInfo or #GIInterfaceInfo.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_get_name ()
refsect2.para: Obtain the name of the @info. What the name represents depends on the #GIInfoType of the @info. For instance for #GIFunctionInfo it is the name of the function.

listitem.simpara: the name of @info or %NULL if it lacks a name.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_get_namespace ()
refsect2.para: Obtain the namespace of @info.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_get_typelib ()
refsect2.para: Obtain the typelib this @info belongs to

refsect2.title: g_base_info_is_deprecated ()
refsect2.para: Obtain whether the @info is represents a metadata which is deprecated or not.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_iterate_attributes ()

listitem.simpara: a #GIAttributeIter structure, must be initialized; see below
Returned name, must not be freed
Returned name, must not be freed

refsect2.title: g_base_info_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increases the reference count of @info.

refsect2.title: g_base_info_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decreases the reference count of @info. When its reference count drops to 0, the info is freed.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: g_irepository_enumerate_versions ()
refsect2.para: Obtain an unordered list of versions (either currently loaded or available) for @namespace_ in this @repository.

listitem.simpara:
the array of versions.
[element-type utf8][transfer full]

refsect2.title: g_irepository_find_by_error_domain ()
refsect2.para:
Searches for the enum type corresponding to the given #GError domain. Before calling this function for a particular namespace, you must call g_irepository_require() once to load the namespace, or otherwise ensure the namespace has already been loaded.
enum type, or %NULL

refsect2.title: g_irepository_find_by_gtype ()
refsect2.para: Searches all loaded namespaces for a particular #GType. Note that in order to locate the metadata, the namespace corresponding to the type must first have been loaded. There is currently no mechanism for determining the namespace which corresponds to an arbitrary GType - thus, this function will operate most reliably when you know the GType to originate from be from a loaded namespace.

refsect2.title: g_irepository_find_by_name ()
refsect2.para: Searches for a particular entry in a namespace. Before calling this function for a particular namespace, you must call g_irepository_require() once to load the namespace, or otherwise ensure the namespace has already been loaded.

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_c_prefix ()
refsect2.para:
This function returns the "C prefix", or the C level namespace associated with the given introspection namespace. Each C symbol starts with this prefix, as well each #GType in the library.
such as g_irepository_require() before calling this function.

listitem.simpara: C namespace prefix, or %NULL if none associated

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_dependencies ()
refsect2.para: Return an array of all (transitive) dependencies for namespace form namespace-version. such as g_irepository_require() before calling this function.

listitem.simpara:
Zero-terminated string array of versioned dependencies
[element-type utf8][transfer full]

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_info ()
refsect2.para: This function returns a particular metadata entry in the given namespace @namespace_. The namespace must have already been loaded before calling this function. See g_irepository_get_n_infos() to find the maximum number of entries.

listitem.simpara: 0-based offset into namespace metadata for entry

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_loaded_namespaces ()
refsect2.para: Return the list of currently loaded namespaces.

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_n_infos ()
refsect2.para: This function returns the number of metadata entries in given namespace @namespace_. The namespace must have already been loaded before calling this function.

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_shared_library ()
refsect2.para:
This function returns the full path to the shared C library associated with the given namespace @namespace_. There may be no shared library path associated, in which case this function will return %NULL.
such as g_irepository_require() before calling this function.

listitem.simpara: Full path to shared library, or %NULL if none associated

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_typelib_path ()
refsect2.para: If namespace @namespace_ is loaded, return the full path to the .typelib file it was loaded from. If the typelib for namespace @namespace_ was included in a shared library, return the special string "$lt;builtin$gt;".

listitem.simpara: Filesystem path (or $lt;builtin$gt;) if successful, %NULL if namespace is not loaded

refsect2.title: g_irepository_get_version ()
refsect2.para:
This function returns the loaded version associated with the given namespace @namespace_.
such as g_irepository_require() before calling this function.

refsect2.title: g_irepository_is_registered ()
refsect2.para: Check whether a particular namespace (and optionally, a specific version thereof) is currently loaded. This function is likely to only be useful in unusual circumstances; in order to act upon metadata in the namespace, you should call g_irepository_require() instead which will ensure the namespace is loaded, and return as quickly as this function will if it has already been loaded.

listitem.simpara:
Required version, may be %NULL for latest
[allow-none]

refsect2.title: g_irepository_require ()
refsect2.programlisting: GITypelib * g_irepository_require (GIRepository *repository, gchar *namespace_, gchar *version, GIRepositoryLoadFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Force the namespace @namespace_ to be loaded if it isn't already. If @namespace_ is not loaded, this function will search for a ".typelib" file using the repository search path. In addition, a version @version of namespace may be specified. If @version is not specified, the latest will be used.

listitem.simpara:
Version of namespace, may be %NULL for latest
[allow-none]
a pointer to the #GITypelib if successful, %NULL otherwise

refsect2.title: g_irepository_require_private ()
refsect2.programlisting: GITypelib * g_irepository_require_private (GIRepository *repository, gchar *typelib_dir, gchar *namespace_, gchar *version, GIRepositoryLoadFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Force the namespace @namespace_ to be loaded if it isn't already. If @namespace_ is not loaded, this function will search for a ".typelib" file within the private directory only. In addition, a version @version of namespace should be specified. If @version is not specified, the latest will be used.

listitem.simpara: Private directory where to find the requested typelib

Version of namespace, may be %NULL for latest
[allow-none]
a pointer to the #GITypelib if successful, %NULL otherwise

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
